function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity on roles and responsibilities for pandemic response","Impact":"Hindering involvement of municipalities, healthcare providers, civil society organizations, and communities in pandemic response","Mitigation":"Producing evidence-based guidance documents specifying the roles of different actors","Technologies":"Document management systems for producing and distributing guidance documents","People":"Municipalities, healthcare providers, civil society organizations, communities","Owner":"K2P Center"},{"Description":"Failure of top-down approach in achieving desired impact for COVID-19","Impact":"Ineffectiveness in addressing the needs of policy implementers and communities","Mitigation":"Supporting evidence-informed policy making, balancing top-down with bottom-up approaches","Technologies":"Evidence-informed policy support tools and networks","People":"Governments, policymakers, policy implementers, communities","Owner":"Organizations, initiatives, networks supporting evidence-informed policy making"}]}
